headline.main: Alpini Reported 'Annihilated' on Albanian Central Front

lead_paragraph: ATHENS, April 2 (UP) -- Greek forces on the central Albanian front have "annihilated" Italy's Val Pescara Battalion of Alpini troops and driven back reinforcements attempting to regain lost ground, a Greek official spokesman said tonight.
abstract: Greeks claim Ital Alpini battalion and ski patrol crushed on Albanian front

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
